say_hello[source]

say_hello(to:str)

A quick example of a function :param to: The name of the person to greet :return: A string with a greeting

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_hello("Salvador")

'Hello Salvador!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

say_goodbye[source]

say_goodbye(to:str)

A second example of a quick function :param to: The name of the person to say bye :return: A string with a farewell

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
say_goodbye(to="Salvador")

'Goodbye Salvador!'
{% endraw %}
